DOC.brief_summary: The Washington State Community Expedited Partner Therapy Trial stepped-wedge community level randomize trial design test hypothesis public health program design increase use expedite partner therapy decrease prevalence chlamydial infection young woman incidence gonorrhea Washington state . The study intervention model intervention previously evaluate King County WA ( Golden MR , Sex Transm Dis 2007 ; 598-603 ) . The intervention two component : 1 ) promotion patient deliver partner therapy ( PDPT ) use medical provider accordance Washington state guideline ; 2 ) target provision partner service . PDPT use promoted education make medication pack PDPT available statewide . Medical provider refer select person gonorrhea chlamydial infection partner service base defined criterion associate failure ensure partner ' treatment . The intervention institute four wave separate 6-9 month . Each wave include approximately 6 local health jurisdiction . The order health jurisdiction initiate intervention randomly assign . The study 's primary endpoint prevalence chlamydial infection woman age 15-25 tested clinic participate state 's Infertility Prevention Project ( IPP ) incidence gonorrhea among woman determine public health reporting .
DOC.brief_title: Washington State Community Expedited Partner Treatment ( EPT ) Trial
DOC.criteria: With reference question sampling , measure PDPT use probability sample person STD . Chlamydial prevalence measure sentinel population . Gonorrhea incidence base public health surveillance . All nonMSM gonorrhea chlamydial infection eligible study intervention . MSM
